title: Pixel 5 wifi setting has no "NONE" option in phase 2 authentication for my work wifi
content:
I recently bought Pixel 5 to use in my workplace. However, I cannot setup my workplace wifi as "NONE" option from phase 2 authentication is not available.

Found some threads, answers and workaround online yet still unable to connect.
Contacted my company service desk, they also have no idea.

Need help with this.

below is my company wifi setup

EAP method: (PEAP)
Phase 2 authentication: (None)
CA certificate: (unspecified) or select Do not Validate
User certificate: (unspecified)
Identity: (your company user name) 
Anonymous identity: (blank)
Password: (your password)
